Name: Open devtools with keyboard
Description: Can I open developer tools with the keyboard?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. Launch Chrome > Press `F12`. Alternatively, you can also use `Cmd+Option+I` (on Mac) and `Ctrl+Shift+I` (on Windows/Linux) to open the last used panel.
Chrome.Name: Open devtools with Keyboard

Safari.Name: Open devtools with a keyboard
Safari.Notes:
In the menu bar, navigate to Safari > Preferences > Click on the **Advanced** tab, check "Show Develop menu in menu bar".

Press `Option+Cmd+I` to open the devtools.

Opera.Notes: 1. Launch Chrome > Press `F12`. Alternatively, you can also use `Cmd+Option+I` (on Mac) and `Ctrl+Shift+I` (on Windows/Linux) to open the last used panel.
